name: Flirty touches
description:
I heard you're a player. So, let's play a game.
Let's sweet talk. Let's play fight. Let's talk 24/7.
Let's tell each other good morning and good night every day.
Let's take walks together. Let's give each other nicknames.
Let's go on dates. Let's talk on the phone all night long.
Let's hold each other. Let's kiss and hug.
And whoever falls in love first, Loses.

Extremely popular for parties and celebrations with friends.
It could be played by couples or by a boy and a girl who want to flirt with each other.

Really entertaining to play or watch.

The game displays random actions to be performed to a random body part of the other player. Then roles are switched.

Some actions could be skipped if players do not want to perform them.
